<description type="note">Preliminaries and introductory material omitted<lb/>The following plays have been taken from this source:</description>

<description type="note">Title: The council of the Jews.
Genre: English mystery and miracle plays.
<description type="note">Square brackets represent sections of the text unclear in the original and supplied by the current editor.</description>

Here xal annas shewyn hym-self in his stage be-seyn after a busshop of Ã¾e hoold lawe in a skarlet gowne and ouer Ã¾at a blew tabbard furryd with whyte and a mytere on his hed after Ã¾e hoold lawe ij doctorys stondyng by hym in furryd hodys and on be-forn hem with his staff of A-stat and eche of hem on here hedys a furryd cappe with a gret knop in Ã¾e crowne and on stondyng be-forn as a sarazyn Ã¾e wich xal be his masangere Annas Ã¾us seyng Annas As a prelat am I properyd, to provyde pes And of jewys jewge Ã¾e lawe to fortefye I Annas be my powere xal comawnde dowteles Ãe lawys of moyses no man xal denye Hoo excede my comawndement Anon ?e certefye Yf Any eretyk here reyn to me ?e compleyn For in me lyth Ã¾e powere all trewthis to trye And pryncypaly oure lawys Ã¾o must I susteyn. ?ef I may aspey Ã¾e contrary no wheyle xal Ã¾ei reyn But a-non to me be browth and stonde present Be-fore here jewge wich xal not feyn But aftere here trespace to gef hem jugement Now serys for A prose heryth myn intent There is on jhesus of nazareth Ã¾at oure lawys doth excede Yf he procede thus we xal us all repent For oure lawys he dystroyt dayly with his dede. There fore be ?our cowncel we must take hede What is be to provyde or do in Ã¾is case Ffor yf we let hym Ã¾us go and ferdere prosede Ageyn sesare and oure lawe we do trespace. primus doctor Sere Ã¾is is myn Avyse Ã¾at ?e xal do Send to cayphas for cowncel knowe his intent For yf jhesu proce and Ã¾us forth go Oure lawys xal be dystroyd thes se we present. ijus doctor Sere remembre Ã¾e gret charge Ã¾at on ?ow is leyd Ãe lawe to ke which may not ffayle Yf any defawth prevyd of ?ow be seyd Ãe jewys with trewth wyl ?ow a-sayl Tak hed whath cownsayl may best provayl After rewfyn and leyon I rede Ã¾at ?e sende They arn temperal jewgys, Ã¾at knowyth Ã¾e parayl With ?oure cosyn cayphas Ã¾is matere to Amende. Annas Now surely Ã¾is cowncel revyfe myn herte ?oure cowncel is best as I can se Arfexe in hast loke Ã¾at Ã¾ou styrte And pray cayphas my cosyn come speke with me. To rewfyn and leon Ã¾u go Also And pray hem Ã¾ei speke with me in hast For A pryncipal matere Ã¾at haue to do Wich must be knowe or Ã¾is day be past. Arfexe My souereyn at ?our intent I xal gon In al Ã¾e hast Ã¾at I kan hy On to Cayphas rewfyn and lyon And charge ?oure intent Ã¾at Ã¾ei xal ply. here goth Ã¾e masangere forth and in Ã¾e mene tyme cayphas shewyth him-self in his skafhald Arayd lych to Annas savyng his tabbard xal be red furryd with white ij doctorys with hym arayd with pellys aftyr Ã¾e old gyse and furryd cappys on here hedys Cayphas Ã¾us seyng. Cayphas As A primat most preudent I present here sensyble buschopys of Ã¾e lawe with al Ã¾e cyrcumstawns I Cayphas am jewge with powerys possyble To distroye all errouris Ã¾at in oure lawys make varyawns All thyngys I convey be reson and temperawnce And all materis possyble to me ben palpable Of Ã¾e lawe of moyses I haue A chef governawns To seuere ryth and wrong in me is termynable. but Ã¾er is on Cryst Ã¾at oure lawys is varyable he perverte Ã¾e pepyl with his prechyng ill We must seke A mene on to hym reprevable ffor yf he procede oure lawys he wyl spyll. We must take good cowncel in Ã¾is case Of Ã¾e wysest of Ã¾e lawe Ã¾at kan Ã¾e trewthe telle of Ã¾e jewgys of pharasy and of my cosyn Annas for yf he procede be prossesse oure lawys he wyl felle. primus doct[or] Myn lord plesyt ?ow to pardon me for to say Ã¾e blame in ?ow is as we fynde to lete cryst contenue Ã¾us day be day With his fals wichcraft Ã¾e pepyl to blynde He werkyth fals meraclis Ageyns all kende And makyth oure pepyl to leve hem in It is ?our part to take hym and do hym bynde And gyf hym jugement for his gret syn. ijus doctor For-sothe sere of trewth this is Ã¾e case On to our lawe ?e don oppressyon Ãat ?e let cryst from ?ou pace and wyl not don on hym correxion Let Annas knowe ?our intencion With prestys and jewgys of Ã¾e lawe And do cryst fforsake his fals oppynyon Or in to A preson lete hem be thrawe. Cayphas Wel serys ?e sal se with-inne short whyle I xal correcte hym for his trespas He xal no lenger oure pepyl be-gyle Out of myn dawngere he xal not pas. here comyth Ã¾e masangere to cayphas and in Ã¾e mene tyme rewfyn and lyon schewyn hem in Ã¾e place in ray tabardys furryd and rayhodys a-bouth here neckys furryd Ã¾e masangere seyng. Masangere Myn reverent souereyn and it do ?ow plese Sere annas my lord hath to ?ou sent He prayt ?ou Ã¾at ?e xal not sese Tyl Ã¾at ?e ben with hym present. Cayphas Sere telle myn cosyn I xal not fayl it was my purpose hym for to se For serteyn materys Ã¾at wyl provayle Ãow he had notwth a sent to me. Masager I recomende me to ?our hey degre on more massagys I must wende. Cayphas Ffare wel sere and wel ?e be gret wel my cosyn and my ffrede here Ã¾e masager metyth with Ã¾e jewgys sayng Masager Heyl jewgys of jewry of reson most prudent of my massage to ?ou I make relacion my lord sere Annas hath for ?ou sent to se his presens with-owth delacion. Rewfyn Sere we Are redy At his comawndement To se sere Annas in his place it was oure purpose and oure intent to A be with hym with-inne short space. leyon We are ful glad his presence to se sere telle hym we xal come in hast no declaracion Ã¾er-in xal be but to his presens hye us fast. masager I xal telle my lord seris as ?e say ?e wyl ful-fylle al his plesawns. Rewfyn Sere telle hym we xal make no delay but come in hast at his instawns. here Ã¾e masangere comyth to Annas Ã¾us seyng masan[ger] My lord and it plese ?ou to haue intellygens Ser Cayphas comyth to ?ou in hast Rewfyn and lyon wyl se ?our presens And se ?ow here or Ã¾is day be past. Annas Sere I kan Ã¾e thank of Ã¾i dyligens Now ageyn my cosyn I wole walk Serys folwyth me on to his presens Ffor of these materys we must talk. here Annas goth down to mete with cayphas and in Ã¾e mene tyme Ã¾us seyng Cayphas Now on to annas let us wende ech of vs to knowe otherys intent Many materys I haue in mende Ãe wich to hym I xal present. ius doctor C. Sere of all othere thyng remembre Ã¾is case Loke Ã¾at ihesus be put to schame. ijus doctor C. Whan we come present beforn annas Whe xal rehers all his gret blame. here Ã¾e buschopys with here clerkys and Ã¾e Pharaseus mett and Ã¾e myd place and Ã¾er xal be a lytil oratory with stolys and cusshonys clenly be-seyn lych as it were a cownsel hous Annas Ã¾us seyng Annas Wel come ser Cayphas and ?e jewgys alle now xal ?e knowe all myn entent A wondyr case serys here is be-falle On wich we must gyf jewgement Lyst Ã¾at we aftyre Ã¾e case repent Of on cryst Ã¾at goddys sone som doth hym calle He shewyth meraclys and sythe present Ã¾at he is prynce of pryncys alle. The pepyl so fast to hym doth falle Be prevy menys as we a-spye ?yf he procede son sen ?e xalle Ã¾at oure lawys he wyl dystrye. It is oure part Ã¾us to deny What is ?our cowncell in Ã¾is cas. Cayphas Be reson Ã¾e trewth here may we try I cannot dem hym with-outh trespace Be-cause he seyth in every A place Ã¾at he kyng of jewys in every degre Ã¾erfore he is fals knowe wel Ã¾e case Sesar is kyng and non but he. Rewfyn He is An eretyk and a tretour bolde To sesare and to oure lawe sertayn Bothe in word and in werke and ?e be-holde He is worthy to dey with mekyl peyn. leon Ã¾e cawse Ã¾at we been here present To fortefye Ã¾e lawe and trewth to say Jhesus ful nere oure lawys hath shent Ã¾erfore he is worthy for to day. ius doctor An[nas] Serys ?e Ã¾at ben rewelerys of Ã¾e lawe On jhesu ?e must gyf jugement Let hym fyrst ben hangyn and drawe and Ã¾anne his body in fyre be brent. ijus doctor An[nas] Now xal ?e here Ã¾e intent of me Take jhesu Ã¾at werke us all gret schame Put hym to deth let hym not fle For Ã¾an Ã¾e comownys Ã¾ei wyl ?ow blame. ius doctor Cayp[has] He werke with weche-crafte in eche place And drawyth Ã¾e pepyl to hese intent Be whare ?e jewgys let hym not passe Ã¾an be my trewthe ?e xal repent. ijus doctor Cayphas Serys takyth hede on to Ã¾is case and in ?our jewgement be not slawe Ã¾er was nevyr man dyd so gret trespace As jhesu hath don Ageyn oure lawe. Annas Now bretheryn Ã¾an wyl ?e here myn intent These ix days let us A-byde We may not gyf so hasty jugement but eche man inqwere on his syde Send spyes A-bouth Ã¾e countre wyde to se and recorde and testymonye And Ã¾an hese werkys he xal not hyde nor haue no power hem to denye. Cayphas This cowncell A-cordyth to my reson. Annas And we All to Ã¾e same.
